A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Completely ruined the Star Wars franchise that we know and love\, with bs political messages that no one asked for. They turned characters into jokes and threw them aside (Finn\, po\, etc) and added unexcesary characters and arcs that we didn't need (yes I'm talking about rose and her terrible story arc) no im not a female hater\, I love females.. I just call bs when I see it. Rey is a Mary Sue with nothing interesting going for her. They could've shown her being trained countless times\, but no she just has to be good at everything naturally. They completely destroyed Luke as a character and made him out to be a joke........ please don't support Disney anymore as they will continue to ruin my favorite franchise.
